item.description:
FREE food, No cover charge, cash bar. 5 PM - 10 PM.

Please provide a firm Yes or No RSVP by Feb. 6th, so we can get the correct amount of food.

This event is not restricted to "talls" - please feel free to bring ONE friend with you -short or tall or inbetween. All we as is that you:.
o RSVP +1 so that we have your friend in the headcount for food,
o Do not double-RSVP - if you have already RSVP'd thru the BBTC Meetup or Marianne's 35+ Meetup, just RSVP No here & indicate in the text that you've already RSVP'd on the other Meetup.

Boston Event Guide offered both us and another Meetup Group a FREE party (excluding drinks) for 20 people each = A GRAND TOTAL of 40 people! just for responding to their survey about their New Year’s Eve party that several of us attended. Splash Ultra Lounge & Burger Bar - here we come!!

Nestled between Chinatown and South Station in Boston’s Leather District, Splash Ultra Lounge & Burger Bar is Frank DePasquale’s latest venture inspired by the posh nightlife destinations of Miami, Vegas and L.A. Located at 150 Kneeland Street, the water-themed venue boasts a picturesque roof deck in addition to a swanky ultra lounge offering state of the art billiards and after-hours dining till 2 a.m.

As Boston’s newest swank ultra-lounge, Splash hosts nightly DJs spinning house, international, top 40’s and mash-up, serving as a chill nightlife destination for both locals and tourists who want to see and be seen. Check out their website for more details. Splash Boston Ultra Lounge & Burger Bar

The event includes a complimentary full food buffet and free admission.

Here is the sample menu (Items may be updated)

o Crab cakes, Buffalo wings
o Marinated steak tips
o Sliders (regular burger sliders)
o Crab meat sliders
o Assorted pastas

Dress Code:
Dressy casual is the minimum; NO sneakers, t-shirts or hats.

Directions:
It’s a 5 or 6 minute walk from either Chinatown or South Station “T” stations.
For additional info, check out Splash Boston Ultra Lounge & Burger Bar
item.name: FREE Party at Splash Boston Ultra Lounge & Burger Bar
